item.title: About
item.description:
Although I’m not good at English, I’ll introduce myself.

Hi, I’m KyuHyun Jung, working as a frontend developer in Seoul, Korea. I’m an enthusiastic software enginner with 3 years of experience.

  • Development of webview-based responsive application
  • Development of payment/delivery/search UI in e-commerce company
  • Development of internal/external admins and UI/UX improvement in e-commerce companies
  • UI planning and UI development of user/administrator console
  • Developing file download API and file download UI using AWS Signed-url function
  • Improved logic related to settlement calculation of nodejs-based backend application and added mongoDB compound index to improve speed by 35%

I am always studying for my growth as a developer and the development of my products, and I am convinced that today’s code is more valuable for business than yesterday’s code, and the code quality is also making better code.

Thanks.

Sorry, There is no content written in English yet.

Writing in English is my long term goal.
